title: # 543 - Robert Kelly & ME
itunes:title: # 543 - Robert Kelly & ME
description:
Today, I sit down and smoke a cigar with comedian, Robert Kelly. We talk about getting dumped, regifting, fighting a homeless guy, how he lost a ton of weight, cigars, watches, and much more! 

 

You can buy his new special “Kill Box” here: https://louisck.com/products/robert-kelly-kill-box 

 

Follow Robert

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/robertkellylive 

Twitter: https://twitter.com/robertkelly 

 

This episode is brought to you by Helix. Get up to $200 off all mattress orders and 2 free pillows at http://www.helixsleep.com/bert 

 

This episode is also brought to you by Black Buffalo Zero. Go to http://www.blackbuffalo.com and use the code “BERT” at checkout for 15% off your first order.

 

This episode is brought to you by Solo Stove. Use the promo code “BERT” at http://www.solostove.com to get an extra $10 off. 

 

This episode is brought to you by Whoop Go to http://www.whoop.com and enter code BERT to save 10% off. To join the 2 Bears, 0 Drinks Team: https://app.whoop.com/mobile-redir?code=COMM-2BEARS (Mobile only)

 

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com 

Berty Boy Productions: https://bertyboyproductions.com  

Twitter: http://www.Twitter.com/bertkreischer 

Facebook: http://www.Facebook.com/BertKreischer 

Instagram: http://www.Instagram.com/bertkreischer 

Youtube: http://www.Youtube.com/user/Akreischer
